children.name: rgov
children.title: RChain Governance
children.description: Goal: Radical decentralization with trust from the top down and bottom up to make good decisions. [See document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/14JJPWtrFxkxzHa1NAmwzhTmeQO1vJtKDOJgBB_MPyfY/edit#).

children.name: rchainwallet

children.description: Community funded RChain wallet development. Locally stored web interface for interaction with RChain platform.

children.name: bootcamp
children.title: Rholang Bootcamp
children.description: "Rholang is simple but not easy." Crash courses and comprehensive program for developers of RChain dapps.
